text: @WSJ Be careful. Drive thru is a risky transmission point. Every cashier, every burger flipper, every food wrapper. Spreading COVID-19 to every driver and occupant of the car and those eating "carry out", Beware. #TyphoidMary in waiting… https://t.co/H1i8aI3eRL
